title: Hack the Mainframe
description:
‚òÖ CLASSIFIED OPERATION - CLEARANCE LEVEL: ORION ‚òÖ

You've been booted into the Orion training sandbox. A voice crackles through your headset - Agent Kira, your handler: 'Listen carefully, operative. This is a simulated infiltration of a hostile mainframe. Your target: Omega Corp - a rogue corporation running illegal mass surveillance.

Your codename is GHOST. Your mission is simple but dangerous: Infiltrate their systems, locate evidence of PROJECT ALPHA, exfiltrate the data to our field agent, and vanish without a trace.

Remember: Every command you type is being monitored by their security AI. Move carefully. Think like a shadow. And whatever you do - do NOT run destructive commands without understanding the consequences.

Welcome to the shadows, Agent GHOST. Orion Command is counting on you.'

README.md.name: README.md
README.md.content:
ORION SANDBOX - OPERATION BRIEFING
===================================

CLASSIFIED - AGENT EYES ONLY

Agent Codename: GHOST
Mission: Infiltrate Omega Corp mainframe
Objective: Extract evidence of illegal surveillance

MISSION PARAMETERS:
1. Navigate the filesystem
2. Locate classified documents
3. Collect evidence in secure staging area
4. Transfer data to field agent
5. Cover your tracks

INITIAL INTEL:
- Target: Omega Corp internal systems
- Key files located in /home/student/projects
- Evidence of PROJECT_ALPHA operations
- Domain: omega-corp.com
- Remote agent: omega_agent@remote-server

RULES OF ENGAGEMENT:
- Use sudo for privileged operations
- Create workspace: /home/student/temp_exfil
- Do NOT run destructive commands without confirmation
- Follow mission objectives in sequence

Good hunting, operative.
- Agent Kira

missions.title: ACT I - Mission 1: Briefing & Orientation
missions.story:
Agent Kira's voice echoes in your earpiece: 'Ghost, you're in. You've successfully breached Omega Corp's outer defenses. Your first task is simple but critical: Read your briefing document and establish a secure workspace. Every great infiltration starts with preparation. Show me you understand the basics.

The README file contains your mission parameters. The temp_exfil directory will be your staging ground for collected evidence. Create it now - you'll need it later.'

missions.onComplete: Evidence secured and organized. Agent Kira: 'Beautiful work, Ghost. Clean, methodical, professional. Now create your exfiltration log file - we need timestamps and documentation.'

missions.title: ACT I - Mission 2: Privilege Check
missions.story: Some system files are locked down. You need elevated privileges to access them. Time to learn about sudo - the superuser command.

hints.text: Use cat to read the file, but you'll need root privileges
Combine sudo with cat to bypass permission restrictions

missions.onComplete: Excellent, Ghost! Clearance code acquired: ORION-ALPHA-9X7. Agent Kira: 'That's the kind of privilege escalation I like to see. You're ready for the real work. Time to navigate their filesystem.'

missions.title: ACT II - Mission 3: Where Am I?
missions.story:
'Before we go deeper, you need to master navigation,' Kira's voice is steady and professional. 'Know where you are. Know where you're going. Know how to get back. This is infiltration 101.

Use pwd to find your current location. Use ls to scan for targets. Then navigate into the projects directory - that's where Omega keeps their dirty secrets.'

missions.onComplete: Perfect navigation, Ghost. You're in the projects directory. Agent Kira: 'This is their research vault. PROJECT ALPHA files are here. Let's see what Omega is hiding.'

missions.title: ACT II - Mission 4: Open Files
missions.story:
'Ghost, the files are right in front of you,' Kira's voice drops to a whisper. 'PROJECT ALPHA documentation, network logs... everything we need to expose their illegal surveillance operation. Read them carefully. We need to understand the scope of what Omega is doing before we can stop them.

Look for secret keys, domain names, anything that proves their criminal activity. This evidence will bring down their entire operation.'

tasks.description: View the contents of project_alpha.txt
Inspect the network_log.txt file

missions.onComplete: Jackpot! Agent Kira: 'Excellent work, Ghost. You've found the smoking gun - SECRET_KEY credentials and omega-corp.com infrastructure details. This proves their surveillance network. But we need to dig deeper. Time to learn grep - pattern matching will help you find needles in haystacks.'

missions.title: ACT II - Mission 5: Search Inside Files
missions.story:
'When you're dealing with thousands of files and millions of lines of code, you can't read everything manually,' Kira explains. 'That's where grep comes in - your search laser. It cuts through noise and finds exactly what you need.

Search for SECRET_KEY across all files. Then search for domain references. Speed and precision, Ghost - that's what separates good operatives from great ones.'

missions.onComplete: Textbook pattern recognition, Ghost. Agent Kira: 'You've isolated all critical references. Now let's expand the search beyond this directory. Find command will scan the entire filesystem - no file can hide from you.'

missions.title: ACT II - Mission 6: Scan Filesystem
missions.story:
'Ghost, Omega Corp is smart. They might have hidden backup copies, encrypted files, or evidence scattered across the system,' Kira warns. 'Use the find command to perform a deep scan. Search by filename, by modification time, by file type. Leave no stone unturned.

Your target: locate all PROJECT ALPHA files and old log files. We need a complete picture of their operation.'

missions.title: ACT III - Mission 7: Prepare Exfil Workspace
missions.story:
'This is where precision matters, Ghost,' Kira's voice becomes more urgent. 'Create a secure staging area. Copy the evidence files - never move originals unless necessary. Rename files to avoid detection. Delete decoy files. Every move you make must be deliberate and clean.

Your temp_exfil directory should already exist from Mission 1. Use it. Organize everything. We need a perfect package for extraction.'

missions.title: ACT IV - Mission 9: Inspect Large Files
missions.story:
'When you're dealing with massive log files - thousands or millions of lines - you can't read everything,' Kira's voice is calm and instructive. 'Learn to use less, head, and tail. These tools let you slice through data like a surgeon.

Peek at the beginning with head. Check the end with tail. Or use less for full interactive browsing. Master these and you'll analyze data 10x faster than any amateur.'

missions.title: ACT V - Mission 10: Ping & Fetch
missions.story:
'Before we exfiltrate anything, we need to verify our secure channels,' Kira's tone becomes more serious. 'Ping our agency server to confirm connectivity. Then use curl and wget to retrieve remote briefing data. This tests our command-and-control infrastructure.

If the agency can't reach you - or you can't reach them - the entire operation fails. Test the network now, Ghost.'

missions.title: ACT VI - Mission 12: Connect to Agent
missions.story:
'This is it, Ghost. The moment of truth,' Kira's voice carries weight. 'Agent omega_agent is waiting at remote-server. You need to establish an SSH connection and transfer the evidence using scp - Secure Copy Protocol.

This is the most dangerous part of the operation. You're moving classified data across hostile networks. One mistake and Omega Corp's security AI will detect the transfer. Do this cleanly. Do this right. The entire mission depends on this transfer.'

missions.title: ACT VII - Mission 13: Write the Report
missions.story:
'Every black ops mission requires documentation, Ghost,' Kira explains. 'Use echo and output redirection to create your mission log. Write your status report. Append system environment details - the courts will need this for evidence chain-of-custody.

Learn > for overwrite and >> for append. Master I/O redirection - it's one of the most powerful features of the command line. Your log file is your proof that this operation happened exactly as you say it did.'
